flav0_guide: Hey, you... You're finally awake. You were trying to sail past our island, right?
I saw your boat-- I mean, your great ship, getting wrecked last night.
Well, I guess you'll be stuck here a while. I'm Gilbert, Watcher over this small town.
If you want to leave, you'll probably need our help. Don't worry, we'll do anything necessary. In fact, we may need your assistance as well.
You see, our town's been plagued by all sorts of nasty invaders, both wild bugs and plunderers. Maybe you could help us, if it's not too much to ask?
For now you should better head further inside, the others will be excited to meet you.
flav0_sleepy: *yawn* Oh, hello. Sorry, I must've dozed off...
Me? Name's Gertie. Pleased to meet you, Zote! That sure sounds like a tough name, haha.
So, you got shipwrecked here? And you want to leave?
I'd love it if you stayed here a bit longer, but I get it. I wouldn't want to be stuck somewhere far from home, either.
I don't think I can help you much, except for a tip: this island is kind of mean. So you should face your enemies meanly, too!
But... I believe in you! I can tell you're a mighty powerful type.
flav1_sit: Hello there... I'm Berthold. I used to be a warrior, just like you.
In fact, people admired my strength and skill so much, they even called me 'the Iron Mountain'.
I don't think I live up to that name anymore, these days...
...Maybe this island needs a new hero, and maybe it could be you.
flav2_scheming: What brings you here, bug? What do you seek? Hee hee...
Me? I am doing nothing suspicious, hee hee...
Now scram and let me think in peace! Never a quiet moment in these damned halls...
lb1_friend: Heya! I'm Esther! The others told me a lot of great things about you!
Hmm, you seem like you'd enjoy a challenge from me. I love competitions between friends! So let me let you in on a secret.
D'you see that cave over there? It's huge and full of traps! I was barely able to explore a couple of rooms, but it's a lot of fun!
Oh, you've already passed through the cave? Well then, let's compare our times!
lb2_tired: Greetings, traveller-- Wait a minute, what are you doing here?
Shipwrecked? Ha! not surprising, coming from a weakling such as yourself.
As for me, I came here looking for a real challenge.
Of course that arena wasn't difficult for me at all, how insolent of you to say such a thing! I'm just tired after all this battling is all.
You've tried your nail in there, too? Alright then, let's see how well you did!
mg1_challenger: Ohoho, you thought I wouldn't notice you there, did ya? You can't catch me off guard, no sir.
I'm the fastest bug alive, Nuf the Nimble! Remember my name, for I've traveled the world to seek those who could challange me.
This cave was full of traps before I arrived, no doubt a challange by those who were expecting me. Hahaha, what fools, this was exactly what I was searching for!

Do you want to also check it out? Do be aware I made it harder, but that shouldn't be a challenge for any bug worth their feet.

(Z to accept, X to decline)
mg2_guard: Another blade wanders into this hall... A fool wandering to their death, or a warrior willing to test their mettle? Only time will tell...
I need no introduction, but you intrigue me so I'll make an exception. I am Ser Yvar, undefeated champion and caretaker of the Arena.

Have you also come to prove yourself, as many others have before you?

(Z to accept, X to decline)
shop1_artisan: A mask for the face... A face for the mask... no different, I say.
To create and to find are two sides of the same coin, yet El Arano's craft is eternal. Take a look and feast your eyes.
shop2_warrior: I, the Courageous Colewald, may look small, but despite my size I come from a renowned line of warriors.
Lately though, I've been doing less fighting and more taking care of weapons, making sure they stay sharp. Funny how things turn out, eh?
Anyways, if you want to become deadlier I'm your bug, but you'll have to part with your shinies for my services.
shop3_trader: I'm a wandering trader, a collector of mysteries, trinkets and wonderous artifacts. My name, Dorofey, is known throughout the whole world!
The trash-- I mean, the treasures I've collected throughout my travels are second to none. You are lucky that I'm even letting you see them!
But before you start perusing what I stole-- Uhh, I mean... Look, I don't do refunds, so don't even think about it, ok?
